body_html: Since I've discovered that despite everything ran fine, the VS2017 (until 15.4) distribution introduced a bug in the /WHOLEARCHIVE trick resulting in unfilled factories (session, device...) as mentioned in. Therefore I am stuck using vs2017 for linking my application with TF.
body_text: Since I've discovered that despite everything ran fine, the VS2017 (until 15.4) distribution introduced a bug in the /WHOLEARCHIVE trick resulting in unfilled factories (session, device...) as mentioned in. Therefore I am stuck using vs2017 for linking my application with TF.
body: Since I've discovered that despite everything ran fine, the VS2017 (until 15.4) distribution introduced a bug in the /WHOLEARCHIVE trick resulting in unfilled factories (session, device...) [as mentioned in](https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/132766/wholearchive-linker-flag-is-dysfunctional-since-15.html). Therefore I am stuck using vs2017 for linking my application with TF.
